BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BLUE RIDGE COMMUNITY HEALTH SERVICES INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES HEALTH CARE TO INDIVIDUALS REGARDLESS OF THEIR ABILITY TO PAY. THIS IS A DIRECT FULFILLMENT OF THEIR TAX EXEMPT PURPOSE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES HEALTH CARE TO INDIVIDUALS REGARDLESS OF THEIR ABILITY TO PAY. THIS IS A DIRECT FULFILLMENT OF THEIR TAX EXEMPT PURPOSE.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES HEALTH CARE REGARDLESS OF THE INDIVIDUALS ABILITY TO PAY. THESE MEDICAL SERVICES ARE PROVIDED IN AREAS THAT HAVE A SHORTAGE OF HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS. THIS IS A DIRECT FULFILLMENT OF THEIR TAX EXEMPT PURPOSE. OVER 169,800 VISITS WERE PROVIDED DURING THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.

ANNUALLY THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT IS SIGNED BY BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED BY THE ENTIRE BOARD. BOARD MEMBERS SHALL EXCUSE THEMSELVES FROM ISSUES THAT ENHANCE THE PROBABILITY OF THEIR OWN PERSONAL AND PRIVATE GAIN.
THE CEO AND CFO OVERSEE FINANCIAL STATEMENT PREPARATION AND AUDIT ENGAGEMENT.
THE CEO, CFO AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990
STATE AND NATIONAL SALARY COMPARISONS ARE USED TO ESTABLISH SALARY LIMITS
FOR TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS. PERFORMANCE EVALUATIONS ARE PERFORMED ANNUALLY AND SALARY INCREASES ARE BOARD APPROVED.
LINE 9 REPRESENTS THE NET CHANGE IN NET ASSETS WITH
DONOR RESTRICTIONS FOR THE YEAR AND REPRESENTS THE
CUMULATIVE EFFECT ADJUSTMENT TO NET ASSETS WITHOUT
DONOR RESTRICTIONS AS A RESULT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S
INC. (BRCHS) ENTERED INTO A BUSINESS ASSOCIATE
AGREEMENT WITH MERIDIAN BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC.
(MBHS) ON OCTOBER 1, 2021, WHEREBY BRCHS OBTAINED CONTROL
OF MBHS WITHIN THE MEANING OF IRC SECTION 512 (B)(13).
AS PART OF THIS AGREEMENT, ALL PRIOR MBHS EMPLOYEES ARE
NOW PAID EMPLOYEES OF BRCHS, WHO IS THEN REIMBURSED BY
MBHS FOR THEIR TIME AND EFFORT TOWARD MBHS OPERATIONS.
